card.name: Ajani Goldmane
card.property: +1: You gain 2 life. −1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. −6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

card.name: Arbiter of Knollridge
card.property: Vigilance When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.

card.name: Austere Command
card.property: Choose two — • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

card.name: Avian Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Today it flies with the flock. Tomorrow it may wake to find them gone, its body in an unfamiliar form.

card.name: Battle Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Boom Boom Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills" —Clachan Tales

card.name: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile
card.property: First strike {T}: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile deals 2 damage to each attacking or blocking creature target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thanks to one champion archer, the true borders of Kinsbaile extend an arrow's flight beyond the buildings.

card.name: Burrenton Forge-Tender
card.property: Protection from red Sacrifice Burrenton Forge-Tender: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."

card.name: Cenn's Heir
card.property: Whenever Cenn's Heir attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kithkin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His home clachan's familial spirit bolsters his own, but he will be ready to preside over the town as cenn only after he learns to project that strength to others.

card.name: Changeling Hero
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Champion a creature (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
card.property: When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Crib Swap
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

card.name: Dawnfluke
card.property: Flash When Dawnfluke enters the battlefield, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Evoke {W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Entangling Trap
card.property: Whenever you clash, tap target creature an opponent controls. If you won, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)

card.name: Favor of the Mighty
card.property: Each creature with the highest converted mana cost has protection from all colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What does a mountain fear of a fly? Giants are barely aware of us, let alone afraid." —Gaddock Teeg

card.name: Galepowder Mage
card.property: Flying Whenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Goldmeadow Dodger
card.property: Goldmeadow Dodger can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've gotten close enough to a giant to smell his breath, but none has ever so much as spotted me. I wonder how long my record can extend?"

card.name: Goldmeadow Harrier
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest." —Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

card.name: Goldmeadow Stalwart
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Kithkin card from your hand or pay {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thoughtweft ties a clachan together. Sharing each other's hopes and fears, all the village's citizens spring into action upon the first threat to any one of them.

card.name: Harpoon Sniper
card.property: {W}, {T}: Harpoon Sniper deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of Merfolk you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made from whiskergill bones, merrow spinebows can fire bolts through tree trunks.

card.name: Hillcomber Giant
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giants believe the fossils they find in Lorwyn's rocky heights are dreams frozen in time, and they treasure them.

card.name: Hoofprints of the Stag
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a hoofprint counter on Hoofprints of the Stag. {2}{W}, Remove four hoofprint counters from Hoofprints of the Stag: Create a 4/4 white Elemental creature token with flying. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Judge of Currents
card.property: Whenever a Merfolk you control becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the currents of the Lanes shift every year, the merrow never lose track of where they are or where they are going.

card.name: Kinsbaile Balloonist
card.property: Flying Whenever Kinsbaile Balloonist attacks, you may have target creature gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when a giant's tantrum turns the sky into a chaotic gale, the path of the balloonist never falters.

card.name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
card.property: When Kinsbaile Skirmisher enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."

card.name: Kithkin Greatheart
card.property: As long as you control a Giant, Kithkin Greatheart gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes a curious giant singles out a "little one" to follow for a few days, never realizing the effect it will have on the little one's life.

card.name: Kithkin Harbinger
card.property: When Kithkin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Kithkin card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her ears are open to even the softest voice.

card.name: Kithkin Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The empathetic nature of the thoughtweft allows kithkin healers to treat the cause of an illness rather than fight its symptoms.

card.name: Knight of Meadowgrain
card.property: First strike Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

card.name: Lairwatch Giant
card.property: Lairwatch Giant can block an additional creature each combat. Whenever Lairwatch Giant blocks two or more creatures, it gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A giant can brood over a grudge for decades, and woe to those who interrupt him.

card.name: Militia's Pride
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you pick a fight with one kithkin, be ready to fight them all.

card.name: Mirror Entity
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.

card.name: Neck Snap
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We merrows need not be disadvantaged when fighting on land. We lack the vulnerability of those who breathe only through their throats." —Minnarin, merrow reejerey

card.name: Oaken Brawler
card.property: When Oaken Brawler enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Oaken Brawler. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A circle of sugar and a word of forbiddance.

card.name: Plover Knights
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

card.name: Pollen Lullaby
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, creatures that player controls don't untap during the player's next untap step. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Purity
card.property: Flying If noncombat damage would be dealt to you, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way. When Purity is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Sentry Oak
card.property: Defender At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may clash with an opponent. If you win, Sentry Oak gets +2/+0 and loses defender until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Shields of Velis Vel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Creatures target player controls get +0/+1 and gain all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Changelings can alter shape based on what the beings around them desire most.

card.name: Soaring Hope
card.property: Enchant creature When Soaring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature has flying. {W}: Put Soaring Hope on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Springjack Knight
card.property: Whenever Springjack Knight attacks, clash with an opponent. If you win, target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Summon the School
card.property: Create two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens. Tap four untapped Merfolk you control: Return Summon the School from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When merrows talk, listeners grow fins." —Kithkin saying

card.name: Surge of Thoughtweft
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a Kithkin, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kithkin weave together their very thoughts, creating a depth of cooperation unknown to other races.

card.name: Thoughtweft Trio
card.property: First strike, vigilance Champion a Kithkin (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Kithkin you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) Thoughtweft Trio can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Triclopean Sight
card.property: Flash Enchant creature When Triclopean Sight enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

card.name: Veteran of the Depths
card.property: Whenever Veteran of the Depths becomes tapped, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the backwaters of the Merrow Lanes lie stones scarred with tallies of countless generations, each representing a victory of merrow soldiers.

card.name: Wellgabber Apothecary
card.property: {1} {W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target tapped Merfolk or Kithkin creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've discovered that boggarts bite, I see. And will the militia be chasing this lot? . . . Ah, you're staying in town to avoid Nath's hunt. Wise. Now this poultice . . ."

card.name: Wispmare
card.property: Flying When Wispmare enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment. Evoke {W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Wizened Cenn
card.property: Other Kithkin creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thoughtweft binds us together as one, part of an intricate pattern that would unravel if even one thread came loose."

card.name: Aethersnipe
card.property: When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Amoeboid Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {T}: Target creature gains all creature types until end of turn. {T}: Target creature loses all creature types until end of turn.

card.name: Aquitect's Will
card.property: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is nowhere on Lorwyn that the Merrow Lanes cannot go.

card.name: Benthicore
card.property: When Benthicore enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens. Tap two untapped Merfolk you control: Untap Benthicore. It gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Broken Ambitions
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that spell's controller puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Captivating Glance
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your end step, clash with an opponent. If you win, gain control of enchanted creature. Otherwise, that player gains control of enchanted creature. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Counter target spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures your opponents control. • Draw a card.

card.name: Deeptread Merrow
card.property: {U}: Deeptread Merrow gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My success at navigating the Dark Meanders irritates the Inkfathom school. They consider themselves peerless divers, but I try to remind them that they cannot own commodities like bravery and cunning."

card.name: Drowner of Secrets
card.property: Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merrows consider themselves the keepers of Lorwyn's past—and consider it their duty to edit when necessary.

card.name: Ego Erasure
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Creatures target player controls get -2/-0 and lose all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When all is taken away, all are equal.

card.name: Ethereal Whiskergill
card.property: Flying Ethereal Whiskergill can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fallowsages debate whether the whiskergill is native to the Dark Meanders or merely dreamstuff made real.

card.name: Faerie Harbinger
card.property: Flash Flying When Faerie Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Faerie card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Faerie Trickery
card.property: Counter target non-Faerie spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fae are so quick and their life spans so short that it's difficult to get retribution for their pranks.

card.name: Fallowsage
card.property: Whenever Fallowsage becomes tapped, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memories of ages past are said to swim the minds of lounging fallowsages.

card.name: Familiar's Ruse
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.

card.name: Fathom Trawl
card.property: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal three nonland cards. Put the nonland cards revealed this way into your hand, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Forced Fruition
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Petals within petals within petals, tadpole. The truth lurks below an opulence of illusion." —Neerdiv, fallowsage

card.name: Glen Elendra Pranksters
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victims spirited through a faerie ring find themselves stranded miles away.

card.name: Glimmerdust Nap
card.property: Enchant tapped creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dreams of giants are as long as time and as deep as the earth. Thus they are prized by the dream-harvesting fae.

card.name: Guile
card.property: Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures. If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Inkfathom Divers
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "None appreciate sun and shallows like those who have seen the depths." —Lianda of the Stonybrook school

card.name: Jace Beleren
card.property: +2: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Merrow Commerce
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, untap all Merfolk you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Schools meet and mingle on Lorwyn's riverways. In the bustling interplay, the merrow renew their sense of community as they sharpen their wits and hone their trading skills.

card.name: Merrow Harbinger
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) When Merrow Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Merrow Reejerey
card.property: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Steady and silent as the deep current, the reejerey guides the course of the school.

card.name: Mistbind Clique
card.property: Flash Flying Champion a Faerie (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Faerie you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) When a Faerie is championed with Mistbind Clique, tap all lands target player controls.

card.name: Mulldrifter
card.property: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Paperfin Rascal
card.property: When Paperfin Rascal enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Paperfin Rascal. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Pestermite
card.property: Flash Flying When Pestermite enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.

card.name: Ponder
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We see the same sky as you, just through a different lens."

card.name: Protective Bubble
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skilled merrow rudders ensure their charges arrive on time and without incident.

card.name: Ringskipper
card.property: Flying When Ringskipper dies, clash with an opponent. If you win, return Ringskipper to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Scattering Stroke
card.property: Counter target spell. Clash with an opponent. If you win, at the beginning of your next main phase, you may add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's converted mana cost. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Scion of Oona
card.property: Flash Flying Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+1. Other Faeries you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Sentinels of Glen Elendra
card.property: Flash Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say the valley of Glen Elendra is mythical, and that rumors of its existence are nothing but a faerie prank. Others say it is the fae's most fiercely guarded secret.

card.name: Shapesharer
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {2}{U}: Target Shapeshifter becomes a copy of target creature until your next turn.

card.name: Silvergill Adept
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}. When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I bring baubles of lore, lost secrets seined from the listening waves."

card.name: Silvergill Douser
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Merfolk and/or Faeries you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Silvergill school monitors traffic on the Lanes, ensuring that the riffraff don't interfere with travelers.

card.name: Sower of Temptation
card.property: Flying When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One glamer leads him far from home. The next washes away his memory that home was ever anywhere but at her side.

card.name: Spellstutter Sprite
card.property: Flash Flying When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

card.name: Stonybrook Angler
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Water is in the air, the trees, and the earth. Understand its motion, speak its language, and the subtle currents that flow through all living things will fall under your command."

card.name: Streambed Aquitects
card.property: {T}: Target Merfolk creature gets +1/+1 and gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We look in the river and see scattered stones. A merrow looks and sees a map of Lorwyn." —Illulia, flamekin soulstoke

card.name: Surgespanner
card.property: Whenever Surgespanner becomes tapped, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They ride on waves of Æther, washing out anything that might pollute the Merrow Lanes.

card.name: Tideshaper Mystic
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He paints with drop and shimmer a world that exists only in the wistful heart.

card.name: Turtleshell Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {1}{U}: Switch Turtleshell Changeling's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A changeling involuntarily mimics the nearest being at hand, sometimes trading a borrowed shell for borrowed claws.

card.name: Wanderwine Prophets
card.property: Champion a Merfolk (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Merfolk you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) Whenever Wanderwine Prophets deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice a Merfolk. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Whirlpool Whelm
card.property: Clash with an opponent, then return target creature to its owner's hand. If you win, you may put that creature on top of its owner's library instead. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Wings of Velis Vel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains all creature types, and gains flying.

card.name: Zephyr Net
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has defender and flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Faeries hang beings that interest them as ornaments in the sky, each clique competing to outshine the prize of the last.

card.name: Black Poplar Shaman
card.property: {2} {B}: Regenerate target Treefolk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It absorbs the pain of other treefolk, which leaves it bitter, yet addicted to the sensation of agony.

card.name: Bog Hoodlums
card.property: Bog Hoodlums can't block. When Bog Hoodlums enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Hoodlums. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Boggart Birth Rite
card.property: Return target Goblin card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Auntie excitedly held up the squalling newborn. "This one looks like Byoog! Maybe he'll tell us what he saw and felt in the beyond."

card.name: Boggart Harbinger
card.property: When Boggart Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Boggart Loggers
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) {2}{B}, Sacrifice Boggart Loggers: Destroy target Treefolk or Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Auntie Flint lent axes to Nibb and Gyik, thinking they'd share their experiences with her. She's still waiting for them to come back.

card.name: Boggart Mob
card.property: Champion a Goblin (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Goblin you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature token.

card.name: Cairn Wanderer
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) As long as a creature card with flying is in a graveyard, Cairn Wanderer has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, landwalk, lifelink, protection, reach, trample, shroud, and vigilance.

card.name: Colfenor's Plans
card.property: When Colfenor's Plans enters the battlefield, exile the top seven cards of your library face down. You may look at and play cards exiled with Colfenor's Plans. Skip your draw step. You can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Dread
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it. When Dread is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Dreamspoiler Witches
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At night, the faeries steal dreamstuff for their queen. At daybreak, countless creatures wake weak and hollow.

card.name: Exiled Boggart
card.property: When Exiled Boggart dies, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the boggarts, there is only one real rule: all new treasures and experiences must be shared. Those who hoard their gifts commit the one truly unforgivable sin.

card.name: Eyeblight's Ending
card.property: Destroy target non-Elf creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one." —Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

card.name: Facevaulter
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Facevaulter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts get so excited when they find something new to smash that they really don't notice who gets underfoot.

card.name: Faerie Tauntings
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may have each opponent lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the fae's constant pranks runs a subtler undercurrent of mockery: the influence of Oona, their hidden queen.

card.name: Final Revels
card.property: Choose one — • All creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. • All creatures get -0/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One whiff of the sweet, pungent scent leads to euphoria—or to an early grave.

card.name: Fodder Launch
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin. Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. Fodder Launch deals 5 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leave it to a boggart to come up with a projectile as disgusting as it is deadly.

card.name: Footbottom Feast
card.property: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scent of rot and vinegar fills the marsh, inviting boggarts from every warren to reunite and feast.

card.name: Ghostly Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {1}{B}: Ghostly Changeling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In desolate places, changelings may take the shape of fancies, or memories, or fears.

card.name: Hoarder's Greed
card.property: You lose 2 life and draw two cards, then clash with an opponent. If you win, repeat this process. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Hornet Harasser
card.property: When Hornet Harasser dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And though she didn't get her honey, Auntie found something far more interesting." —A tale of Auntie Grub

card.name: Hunter of Eyeblights
card.property: When Hunter of Eyeblights enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you don't control. {2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with a counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snokk ran as fast as he could, but the sound of hooves grew ever louder in his ears.

card.name: Knucklebone Witch
card.property: Whenever a Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Knucklebone Witch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each bone honors its owner's best pranks.

card.name: Liliana Vess
card.property: +1: Target player discards a card. −2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. −8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Lys Alana Scarblade
card.property: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.

card.name: Mad Auntie
card.property: Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Regenerate another target Goblin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One part cunning, one part wise, and many, many parts demented.

card.name: Makeshift Mannequin
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mannequin counter on it. For as long as that creature has a mannequin counter on it, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This vulgar mimicry will end now." —Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

card.name: Marsh Flitter
card.property: Flying When Marsh Flitter enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens. Sacrifice a Goblin: Marsh Flitter has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

card.name: Moonglove Winnower
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Winnowers live to eliminate eyeblights, creatures the elves deem too ugly to exist.

card.name: Mournwhelk
card.property: When Mournwhelk enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards. Evoke {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Nameless Inversion
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Target creature gets +3/-3 and loses all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.

card.name: Nath's Buffoon
card.property: Protection from Elves

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Smik learned the elvish dance quickly enough. The most difficult, yet most important step was to stay out of Nath's sight until called to perform.

card.name: Nectar Faerie
card.property: Flying {B}, {T}: Target Faerie or Elf gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The unpredictable fae are just as likely to provide a blight as a boon." —Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

card.name: Nettlevine Blight
card.property: Enchant creature or land Enchanted permanent has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent and attach Nettlevine Blight to a creature or land you control."

card.name: Nightshade Stinger
card.property: Flying Nightshade Stinger can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most faeries are harmless pranksters. Every now and again, though, you get one that crosses over from mischievous to malicious." —Gaddock Teeg

card.name: Oona's Prowler
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Oona's Prowler gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in Glen Elendra blossoms Oona, queen of the faeries, nourished by secrets and pollinated by stolen dreams.

card.name: Peppersmoke
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If you control a Faerie, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like being trapped in a perpetual sneeze, faerie-dust poisoning is both exhilarating and agonizing.

card.name: Profane Command
card.property: Choose two — • Target player loses X life. • Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. • Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Prowess of the Fair
card.property: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An elvish duel is a thing of beauty: the warriors' grace, the crash of steel, then the artful spray of blood.

card.name: Quill-Slinger Boggart
card.property: Whenever a player casts a Kithkin spell, you may have target player lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good day in Goldmeadow is one in which I don't spend all evening picking quills out of my backside." —Calydd, kithkin farmer

card.name: Scarred Vinebreeder
card.property: {2} {B}, Exile an Elf card from your graveyard: Scarred Vinebreeder gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For disfigured elves, there are few choices beyond death or nettlevine.

card.name: Shriekmaw
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Skeletal Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Skeletal Changeling.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though they lack true flesh and bone of their own, changelings imitate either with equal ease.

card.name: Spiderwig Boggart
card.property: When Spiderwig Boggart enters the battlefield, target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Auntie Flint was the first to pioneer the spiderwig, a mass of arachnids intended to be worn rather than eaten.

card.name: Squeaking Pie Sneak
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Goblin card from your hand or pay {3}. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do our pies squeak? It's all the faeries, mice, and prickly-hogs we stuff inside." —Borb of the Squeaking Pie warren

card.name: Thieving Sprite
card.property: Flying When Thieving Sprite enters the battlefield, target player reveals X cards from their hand, where X is the number of Faeries you control. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.

card.name: Thorntooth Witch
card.property: Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, you may have target creature get +3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crone's boughs creaked as she spoke. "You look peaked, little one. Come, sip from my warm brew. It'll have you blooming in no time."

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

card.name: Warren Pilferers
card.property: When Warren Pilferers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card is a Goblin card, Warren Pilferers gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do they need all this stuff for? They're dead. We're alive. Simple enough."

card.name: Weed Strangle
card.property: Destroy target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Adder-Staff Boggart
card.property: When Adder-Staff Boggart enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Adder-Staff Boggart. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Ashling the Pilgrim
card.property: {1} {R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ashling the Pilgrim. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, remove all +1/+1 counters from Ashling the Pilgrim, and it deals that much damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Ashling's Prerogative
card.property: As Ashling's Prerogative enters the battlefield, choose odd or even. (Zero is even.) Each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value has haste. Each creature without converted mana cost of the chosen value enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angriest of giants are often the most skillful weaponsmiths. Their grudges fuel endless sessions at the forge, all the while growling ferociously to themselves.

card.name: Blades of Velis Vel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

card.name: Blind-Spot Giant
card.property: Blind-Spot Giant can't attack or block unless you control another Giant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the solitude-loving giantkind, teamwork is unusual. But he appreciates hearing the occasional "Swing down and to your left."

card.name: Boggart Forager
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Boggart Forager: Target player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reach in this hole, lose a hand. Reach in that hole, find a sparkly." —Auntie wisdom

card.name: Boggart Shenanigans
card.property: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

card.name: Boggart Sprite-Chaser
card.property: As long as you control a Faerie, Boggart Sprite-Chaser gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Auntie pointed out to the faerie how much mischief a flying boggart could wreak, and a beautiful new friendship was born." —A tale of Auntie Grub

card.name: Caterwauling Boggart
card.property: Goblins you control and Elementals you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As far as I can tell, that frog dangling from the stick serves absolutely no purpose whatsoever." —Gaddock Teeg

card.name: Ceaseless Searblades
card.property: Whenever you activate an ability of an Elemental, Ceaseless Searblades gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flamekins' fires burn cool until they decide otherwise.

card.name: Chandra Nalaar
card.property: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. −X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. −8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

card.name: Changeling Berserker
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Haste Champion a creature (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

card.name: Consuming Bonfire
card.property: Choose one — • Consuming Bonfire deals 4 damage to target non-Elemental creature. • Consuming Bonfire deals 7 damage to target Treefolk creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elves use treefolk to drive us away. It is time to remove their tools." —Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

card.name: Crush Underfoot
card.property: Choose a Giant creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Five-toed grave —Kithkin phrase meaning "a giant's footprint"

card.name: Faultgrinder
card.property: Trample When Faultgrinder enters the battlefield, destroy target land. Evoke {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Fire-Belly Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns." —Auntie Wort

card.name: Flamekin Bladewhirl
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal an Elemental card from your hand or pay {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elves may try to confine us, but they will learn that our blazing spirit can never be suppressed." —Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

card.name: Flamekin Brawler
card.property: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he hits people, they stay hit.

card.name: Flamekin Harbinger
card.property: When Flamekin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elemental card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Flamekin Spitfire
card.property: {3} {R}: Flamekin Spitfire deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some flamekin warriors explore the art of coherence, an ancient discipline that harnesses the chaos of fire and focuses it with pinpoint precision.

card.name: Giant Harbinger
card.property: When Giant Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Giant card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Giant's Ire
card.property: Giant's Ire deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. If you control a Giant, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only feeling greater than hurling something a mile is crushing something else with it that was really, really irritating you.

card.name: Glarewielder
card.property: Haste When Glarewielder enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures can't block this turn. Evoke {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Goatnapper
card.property: When Goatnapper enters the battlefield, untap target Goat and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kith goats are just for practice. The real prize, of course, is a giant's cloudgoat.

card.name: Hamletback Goliath
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear." —Gaddock Teeg

card.name: Hearthcage Giant
card.property: When Hearthcage Giant enters the battlefield, create two 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature tokens. Sacrifice an Elemental: Target Giant creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flamekin are mere kindling for his warmth.

card.name: Heat Shimmer
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, exile this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Better to flare out than to gutter." —Flamekin expression

card.name: Hostility
card.property: Haste If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Create a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Hurly-Burly
card.property: Choose one — • Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. • Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Things were popping like corn in a skillet. Olly landed in the pig pen with his prize sow on top of him, both squealin' like boggarts." —Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

card.name: Incandescent Soulstoke
card.property: Other Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1. {1}{R}, {T}: You may put an Elemental creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Incendiary Command
card.property: Choose two — • Incendiary Command deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Incendiary Command deals 2 damage to each creature. • Destroy target nonbasic land. • Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Ingot Chewer
card.property: When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

card.name: Inner-Flame Acolyte
card.property: When Inner-Flame Acolyte enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Inner-Flame Igniter
card.property: {2} {R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A light an army can follow.

card.name: Lash Out
card.property: Lash Out deals 3 damage to target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, Lash Out deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Lowland Oaf
card.property: {T}: Target Goblin creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know why the little one was so mad. He said to put him down, and I put him down."

card.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
card.property: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

card.name: Needle Drop
card.property: Needle Drop deals 1 damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First it was plovers and mulldrifters. Now it's knitting needles the size of javelins." —Calydd, kithkin farmer

card.name: Nova Chaser
card.property: Trample Champion an Elemental (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elemental you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

card.name: Rebellion of the Flamekin
card.property: Whenever you clash, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token. If you won, that token gains haste until end of turn. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)

card.name: Smokebraider
card.property: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

card.name: Soulbright Flamekin
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

card.name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil
card.property: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

card.name: Sunrise Sovereign
card.property: Other Giant creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hundred generations has he mentored, a hundred armies has he crushed beneath his feet, yet only a hundred words has he ever spoken, each more revered than a hundred books.

card.name: Tar Pitcher
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ." —A tale of Auntie Grub

card.name: Tarfire
card.property: Tarfire deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious." —A tale of Auntie Grub

card.name: Thundercloud Shaman
card.property: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.

card.name: Wild Ricochet
card.property: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew that trick long before your great-grandmother's great-grandmother was born."

card.name: Battlewand Oak
card.property: Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Bog-Strider Ash
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Whenever a player casts a Goblin spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you want to test wisdom, offer it to fools and watch how they tear it up."

card.name: Briarhorn
card.property: Flash When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Changeling Titan
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Champion a creature (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

card.name: Cloudcrown Oak
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Clever folk build their homes near cloudcrowns. If a hawk or even just a faerie tries to swoop in, it'll get swatted from here to Cloverdell." —Calydd, kithkin farmer

card.name: Cloudthresher
card.property: Flash Reach When Cloudthresher enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Evoke {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Dauntless Dourbark
card.property: Dauntless Dourbark's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control plus the number of Treefolk you control. Dauntless Dourbark has trample as long as you control another Treefolk.

card.name: Elvish Branchbender
card.property: {T}: Until end of turn, target Forest becomes an X/X Treefolk creature in addition to its other types, where X is the number of Elves you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How do the vinebred feel? Fah! We do not ask the puppet how it feels when the puppeteer bids it dance."

card.name: Elvish Eulogist
card.property: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

card.name: Elvish Handservant
card.property: Whenever a player casts a Giant spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Handservant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hardest lesson for any elf to learn is humility. It takes a giant to teach that.

card.name: Elvish Harbinger
card.property: When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Elvish Promenade
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

card.name: Epic Proportions
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and has trample.

card.name: Eyes of the Wisent
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a blue spell during your turn, you may create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Calm as a wisent's watch —Elvish expression meaning "safe"

card.name: Fertile Ground
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pretty, valuable, and delicious—a boggart thief's trifecta.

card.name: Fistful of Force
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that creature gets an additional +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Garruk Wildspeaker
card.property: +1: Untap two target lands. −1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Gilt-Leaf Ambush
card.property: Create two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens. Clash with an opponent. If you win, those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Gilt-Leaf Seer
card.property: {G}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Desmera blinded her seers so that her beauty would be the last image burned in their memories. The act only deepened their insight.

card.name: Guardian of Cloverdell
card.property: When Guardian of Cloverdell enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. {G}, Sacrifice a Kithkin: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although they're protective of all creatures, many treefolk are especially fond of the empathic kithkin.

card.name: Heal the Scars
card.property: Regenerate target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elvish battle-magic has evolved two specialties: inflicting wounds that scar, and healing wounds without scarring. Politics determines the recipients of each.

card.name: Hunt Down
card.property: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Springjacks and faeries can be difficult to hunt, but my favorite prey are the flamekin. They never fail to put up a worthy fight when cornered."

card.name: Immaculate Magistrate
card.property: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures—sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.

card.name: Imperious Perfect
card.property: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

card.name: Incremental Growth
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tie a mouse under a bridge, and your cabbages will triple in size." —Kithkin superstition

card.name: Jagged-Scar Archers
card.property: Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control. {T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

card.name: Kithkin Daggerdare
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kith dance their elaborate reels not merely to celebrate the events of their lives but to form an unbreakable bond of loyalty with their kin, a bond stronger than the fear of death itself.

card.name: Kithkin Mourncaller
card.property: Whenever an attacking Kithkin or Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren's hunts are dangerous affairs. All dread the inevitable recounting of those who died while flushing out his prey.

card.name: Lace with Moonglove
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?" —Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

card.name: Lammastide Weave
card.property: Choose a card name, then target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. If that card has the chosen name, you gain life equal to its converted mana cost. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A ribbon torn will ward away dark dreams."

card.name: Leaf Gilder
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

card.name: Lignify
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is a Treefolk with base power and toughness 0/4 and loses all abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his feet be so thirsty?

card.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
card.property: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

card.name: Masked Admirers
card.property: When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

card.name: Nath's Elite
card.property: All creatures able to block Nath's Elite do so. When Nath's Elite enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Nath's Elite. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Oakgnarl Warrior
card.property: Vigilance, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."

card.name: Primal Command
card.property: Choose two — • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rootgrapple
card.property: Destroy target noncreature permanent. If you control a Treefolk, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the sylvan secrets of this world are etched between my rings. The skinfolk's metal aberrations can rot between my roots." —Colfenor, the Last Yew

card.name: Seedguide Ash
card.property: When Seedguide Ash dies, you may search your library for up to three Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you shade three generations of seedlings."

card.name: Spring Cleaning
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. Clash with an opponent. If you win, destroy all enchantments your opponents control. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

card.name: Sylvan Echoes
card.property: Whenever you clash and win, you may draw a card. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes a huntmaster's eye to discern the contours of mythical prey.

card.name: Timber Protector
card.property: Other Treefolk creatures you control get +1/+1. Other Treefolk and Forests you control have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In his presence, an ordinary grove becomes a bastion to turn spells and break armies.

card.name: Treefolk Harbinger
card.property: When Treefolk Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Treefolk or Forest card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Vigor
card.property: Trample If damage would be dealt to another creature you control, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Warren-Scourge Elf
card.property: Protection from Goblins

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If one can associate any virtue with the eyeblights, it is the talent some achieve in disposing of them. I have seen the slaying of boggarts raised nearly to an art form." —Fiala, Gilt-Leaf winnower

card.name: Woodland Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Changelings cannot resist the draw of a new shape, even if doing so would be in their best interests.

card.name: Woodland Guidance
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, untap all Forests you control. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.) Exile Woodland Guidance.

card.name: Wren's Run Packmaster
card.property: Champion an Elf (When this creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elf you control. When this creature leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.) {2}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Wolves you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}. Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Brion Stoutarm
card.property: Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Doran, the Siege Tower
card.property: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each year that passes rings you inwardly with memory and might. Wield your heart, and the world will tremble."

card.name: Gaddock Teeg
card.property: Noncreature spells with converted mana cost 4 or greater can't be cast. Noncreature spells with {X} in their mana costs can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So great is his wisdom and spirit that many who have met him say that they stood before a giant of a man and talked to the wisest of the four winds.

card.name: Horde of Notions

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Vigilance, trample, haste {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You may play target Elemental card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the oldest treefolk was but an acorn when Lorwyn's first mysteries were born.

card.name: Nath of the Gilt-Leaf
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have target opponent discard a card at random. Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A savage hunter with a prince's bearing.

card.name: Sygg, River Guide
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {1}{W}: Target Merfolk you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there's a place worth going, the Merrow Lanes already do. And if there's a route worth taking, yours truly already has."

card.name: Wort, Boggart Auntie
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target Goblin card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Auntie always knows which berries to lick, which kithkin to trick, and what to do when either goes wrong.

card.name: Wydwen, the Biting Gale
card.property: Flash Flying {U}{B}, Pay 1 life: Return Wydwen, the Biting Gale to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a world of bright, cloudless skies, she is the dark storm on the horizon.

card.name: Colfenor's Urn
card.property: Whenever a creature with toughness 4 or greater is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it. At the beginning of the end step, if three or more cards have been exiled with Colfenor's Urn, sacrifice it. If you do, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Deathrender
Dolmen Gate
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lorwyn's stones resonate with the place from which they were hewed. Though taken far, still they call to their home when silence is upon the land.

card.name: Herbal Poultice
card.property: {3}, Sacrifice Herbal Poultice: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Apply orange leaf to a wound at dawn to clean it, at dusk to prevent the same injury from happening again." —Kithkin superstition

card.name: Moonglove Extract
card.property: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

card.name: Rings of Brighthearth
card.property: Whenever you activate an ability, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without flame, there would be no iron tools, no cooked meals, no purge of old growth to make room for new." —Brighthearth creed

card.name: Runed Stalactite
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is every creature type. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a changeling adopts a form no other changeling has taken, a rune appears in the caverns of Velis Vel to mark the event.

card.name: Springleaf Drum
card.property: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After trying mudskippers for an afternoon, Scratch decided that crickcarp made the best noise.

card.name: Thorn of Amethyst
card.property: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mined from a cave in the Dark Meanders, it shines brightest when no one is looking.

card.name: Thousand-Year Elixir
card.property: You may activate abilities of creatures you control as though those creatures had haste. {1}, {T}: Untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Paradoxically, to tilt the massive jug for a sip, you'd need the energy of the giant's tonic.

card.name: Twinning Glass
card.property: {1}, {T}: You may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost if it has the same name as a spell that was cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes two to craft a mirror: a practiced metalsmith to silver one side and her own hazy reflection to polish the other.

card.name: Wanderer's Twig
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Wanderer's Twig: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For every tree who falls, there are countless sprouts waiting to rise.

card.name: Ancient Amphitheater
card.property: As Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Giant card from your hand. If you don't, Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arbiter Galanda Feudkiller judges Lorwyn's squabbles from a lofty perspective.

card.name: Auntie's Hovel
card.property: As Auntie's Hovel enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Goblin card from your hand. If you don't, Auntie's Hovel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Stinkdrinker warren's hill of salvaged trinkets is large enough to cut a door in.

card.name: Gilt-Leaf Palace
card.property: As Gilt-Leaf Palace enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Elf card from your hand. If you don't, Gilt-Leaf Palace enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dawn's Light, greatest palace of Gilt-Leaf Wood, is built on tiers of wood and power.

card.name: Howltooth Hollow
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {B}. {B}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if each player has no cards in hand.

card.name: Mosswort Bridge
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {G}. {G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

card.name: Secluded Glen
card.property: As Secluded Glen enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Faerie card from your hand. If you don't, Secluded Glen enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Protected by glamers and guile, Glen Elendra harbors the elusive Oona, queen of the fae.

card.name: Shelldock Isle
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {U}. {U}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.

card.name: Shimmering Grotto
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once each year, the sun's rays reach the hidden chamber of Velis Vel, and the changelings congregate from afar to bathe in the ever-shifting light.

card.name: Spinerock Knoll
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {R}. {R}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if an opponent was dealt 7 or more damage this turn.

card.name: Vivid Crag
card.property: Vivid Crag enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Vivid Creek
card.property: Vivid Creek enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {U}. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Creek: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Vivid Grove
card.property: Vivid Grove enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Grove: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Vivid Marsh
card.property: Vivid Marsh enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Marsh: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Vivid Meadow
card.property: Vivid Meadow enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {W}. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Meadow: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Wanderwine Hub
card.property: As Wanderwine Hub enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Merfolk card from your hand. If you don't, Wanderwine Hub enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Below the great river, a bustling hub channels the flow of merrow trade.

card.name: Windbrisk Heights
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W}. {W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.
